description: This traditional Ukrainian entree is a great way to enjoy eggplant and is usually served cold with fresh herbs on top.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Eggplants Mezhivo Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Season the eggplant discs with salt and pepper. Heat half of the oil in a large pan on medium heat and fry the eggplant discs for 3 minutes on each side, or until golden. Remove from the pan and set aside.
Add the rest of the oil and cook the onion for 8-10 minutes, until browned. Remove from the pan and set aside.

Cook the tomatoes in the same pan over a low heat for 5 minutes until broken down slightly. Pass the tomatoes through a fine sieve into a bowl, it should be paste-like in consistency. Add vinegar and sugar to the paste and season.
Add the eggplant and onion back into the pan and cook on a low heat for 25 minutes. Allow to cool completely before serving with chopped parsley on top.
